thread.title: NavyVet
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by NavyVet

author: NavyVet
title: NavyVet
text: While they didn't have a whole lot of options on hand for my Nissan Titan, they had what I was looking for and were able to get it all done very quickly. I also like that they actually follow proper torque spec requirements instead of just slapping the wheels on and hitting it withan impact driver, its much better for the life of the lug nuts and studs.
